text: Scoop out a teaspoon or 2 of margarine and put it on the side of your plate. Add a teaspoon of sugar and a little dash of cinnamon. Use your butter knife to mash the ingredients together until all the ingredients are mixed very well.  Get your bread and spread the mixture on it. The thicker it is, the tastier it is. Put the bread into the toaster oven and set it on low. Allow it to toast lightly and caramelize. Turn your toaster on low and put the bread in and push the toast button, it is best to stand beside it and make sure it doesn't burn. it should sizzle a tiny bit as the sugar caramelizes and the margarine soaks it into the bread. Enjoy your puffy bread with caramelized sugar melted into it. There will be a little caramelized sugar on the top.
